songs.title: Empty Barrell
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Kardinal Offishall] + (Blessed)
Well yuh dun know a Kardinal Offishall AKA Celebrity Face
And Blessed inna di place (Why di I dem waan try?)
(Yo Troyton, Remi, Black Shadow where the horns at?!)
You have been saved, Blessed

[Chorus: Blessed] + (Kardinal Offishall)
Empty barrell mek di most noise dem wise inna dem own eyes yo
(Dat mi a seh)
Nuff a devil widout dem disguise
Who nah tell people dem dispise you
Badmind don't wanna see we rise
Dem wipin up and livin out dem bredrin advice
(Yah mon) Dem a devil widout di disguise
Who nah tell people dem dispise

[Verse 1: Kardinal Offishall]
Yo yo, as mi look inna yuh face mi see di fassy in di place
As quickly as they come even quicker dem get erased
Talk about beef but dem nah go get a taste
Dem better realize before dem jump inna di race
Yo! When a man a big man mi nuh have time fi chase
Mi have time fi woman mi nuh have time fi waste
Big talk fah dem bredrin zip face to face
Dem nuh waan nobody deal wid dem case

[Chorus: Blessed] + (Kardinal Offishall)
Empty barrell mek di most noise
Dem wise inna dem own eyes yo (Yuh dun know!)
Nuff a devil widout dem disguise
Who nah tell people dem dispise you (A dat mi a seh)
Badmind don't wanna see we rise
Dem wipin up and livin out dem bredrin advice (Cho!)
Dem a devil widout di disguise who nah tell people dem dispise

[Verse 2: Kardinal Offishall]
Yo!
Di likkle fool a gwaan like Saddam caan talk wid nuh repercussion
Dun di place dem change dem face and deal wid nuh discussion
Man a nuh big man, when a dig man gal we a defend
If yuh nuh love di gal dem then yuh have a problem
Because yuh know mi name dat nuh mean seh mi and yuh a friend
Woman we a look but only fassy yuh a send
Dem likkle pussyhole we nah mix wid dem dem dem, yeah!!!

[Chorus: Blessed] + (Kardinal Offishall)
Empty barrell mek di most noise dem wise inna dem own eyes yo (Cho!)
Nuff a devil widout dem disguise
Who nah tell people dem dispise you (A dat mi a seh)
Badmind don't wanna see we rise
Dem wipin up and livin out dem bredrin advice
Dem a devil widout di disguise who nah tell people dem dispise

[Verse 3: Blessed]
Yo yo! We enemies dem a fi see we pack down
Proud to see we body goin unda di ground
Dem stink like (?) dem mouth smell like dog
Old pedofile dem girlfriend too young
Hygrade sensimenia comin out a we lung
Slap dem out dem mouth from nyamin out Miss Chung
Easy Kardinal a respect maximum
Blessed pon di mic a respect maximum

[Chorus: Blessed] + (Kardinal Offishall)
Empty barrell mek di most noise dem wise inna dem own eyes yo
(Yuh dun know)
Nuff a devil widout dem disguise
Who nah tell people dem dispise you (Dat mi a seh)
Badmind don't wanna see we rise
Dem wipin up and livin out dem bredrin advice (Dun know)
Dem a devil widout di disguise who nah tell people dem dispise

[Repeat Verse 1]

[Repeat Chorus until end]
